name: metrics_replay
description: Metrics snapshot for the replay tile

root_slot.description: The slot at which our node has most recently rooted

root_distance.description: The distance in slots between our current root and the current reset slot

leader_slot.description: The slot at which we are currently leader, or 0 if none

next_leader_slot.description: The slot at which we are next leader, or 0 if none. If we are currently leader, this is the same as the current leader slot

reset_slot.description: The slot at which we last reset the replay stage, or 0 if unknown

max_live_banks.description: The maximum number of banks we can have alive

live_banks.description: The number of banks we currently have alive

reasm_free.description: The number of free FEC sets in the reassembly queue

reasm_latest_slot.description: Slot of the latest FEC set in the reassembly queue that can be replayed

reasm_latest_fec_idx.description: FEC set index of the latest FEC set in the reassembly queue that can be replayed

transactions_total.description: Count of transactions processed overall on the current fork

sched_full.description: Times where sched is full and a FEC set can't be processed

reasm_empty.description: Times where reasm is empty and a FEC set can't be processed

leader_bid_wait.description: Times where replay is blocked by the PoH tile not sending an end of leader message

banks_full.description: Times where banks are full and a FEC set can't be processed

storage_root_behind.description: Times where the storage root is behind the consensus root and can't be advanced

progcache_rooted.description: Number of program cache entries rooted

progcache_gc_root.description: Number of program cache entries garbage collected while rooting

accdb_created.description: Number of account database records created

accdb_reverted.description: Number of account database records reverted

accdb_rooted.description: Number of account database entries rooted

accdb_gc_root.description: Number of account database entries garbage collected

accdb_reclaimed.description: Number of account database entries reclaimed (deletion rooted)
